accessibility.title: Accessible to all
accessibility.body: This site is designed to be accessible to the widest possible public (contrasts, choice of colors) while maintaining its visual identity. However, it is possible that some points escaped us during its design, so any constructive comments will be welcome on the Discord of the community, in the section dedicated to accessibility to all.

download.title: Download
download.body: You can download the book of your choice in PDF or EPUB format by clicking on the download icon placed below each book.

B_Reading.title: Beta-reading service
B_Reading.body: We can provide a paid Beta-Reading service to anyone who wants it. For more information, please contact us on the Discordof the community, in the section dedicated to Beta-Reading.

generators.title: Using generators
generators.body: The generators are made available to you as fun tools to allow you to create freely. They will be completed and fleshed out over the life cycle of the site. However, if you would like to help with the development of new dictionaries or adding new content, you can go to the Discord community, in the section dedicated to sharing and improved content.

sharing.title: Share your works
sharing.body: You do want to add your work to this site ? No problem ! Get in touch with us on the Discord community, in the section dedicated to new authors.
